channel.title: Posts on 2022 Cascade Volcanoes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 2022 Cascade Volcanoes

item.title: Lawetlat'la (Mt St Helens)
item.description: Lawetlat’la is the smallest of the Washington volcanoes but it also has one of the easiest approaches, because the road to the trailhead is plowed, even in winter. To get to the summit is about 5000' of elevation gain and around 5.5 miles each way. We had a blast of warm weather at the beginning of February which Greg, Allison, and I took advantage of to take a quick trip up Mt St Helens.
